LinesAnswers.name: intro
LinesAnswers.line: Good morning to me, the landscape in the window has already changed, I wonder how far I am from home. However, I am less and less eager to go back - a one-way ticket, so to say, although I don't even have a ticket. (Urr...urr...urr...Buburr...my stomach rumbles). Okay, I need something to eat and a place to sleep in the new car.
